data.text: Then Bildad the Shuhite answered and said,
How long wilt thou continue?
For wherefore have we been silent before thee like brutes?
Anger has possessed thee:
But the light of the ungodly shall be quenched,
His light shall be darkness in his habitation,
Let the meanest of men spoil his goods,
His foot also has been caught in a snare,
And let snares come upon him:
His snare is hidden in the earth,
Let pains destroy him round about,
Vex him with distressing hunger:
Let the soles of his feet be devoured:
And let health be utterly banished from his tabernacle,
It shall dwell in his tabernacle in his night:
His roots shall be dried up from beneath,
Let his memorial perish out of the earth,
Let one drive him from light into darkness.
He shall not be known among his people,
But strangers shall dwell in his possessions:
These are the houses of the unrighteous,
